00032 inline unsigned long vme_read_d32(struct vme_handle *handle, 
00033                                   unsigned long vme_addr)
00034 {
00035   volatile unsigned long *p = (volatile unsigned long *)
00036     (handle->base + (vme_addr - handle->vme_base));
00037   return *p;
00038 }

00083 inline unsigned long vme_read_d32_checked(struct vme_handle *handle, 
00084                                           unsigned long vme_addr,
00085                                           int *status = NULL)
00086 {
00087   unsigned long result;
00088 
00089   int status1 = vme_dma_read(handle, vme_addr, (unsigned char *) &result, 
00090                              sizeof(unsigned long));
00091 
00092   if(status != NULL) {
00093     if(status1 == sizeof(unsigned long)) {
00094       *status = SUCCESS;
00095     } else {
00096       *status = -1;
00097     }
00098   }
00099 
00100   return result;
00101 }
